store_headline: It's not cheating if you don't get caught.
external_chair_desc: With the proper settings, Azec's External features will bypass Ricochet. High-performance, undetected hacks at unbeatable prices, backed by premium customer support.
feature1_title: You get the advantage, they make the excuses.
feature2_title: An invisible advantage, an unstoppable success.
feature_security_desc: Security is one of our highest priorities, we are constantly improving our software to stay undetected.
feature_instant_desc: Registration and checkout is quick and easy. You can start using your product right after buying your license.
feature_updates_desc: All our products are updated after each game update, all down time is compensated.
feature_compensation_desc: If one of our products goes down for any reason, the time will always be compensated.
feature_quality_desc: The best of its class, our software is the standard at which all others are measured.
feature_support_desc: Get help when you need it, round the clock. Our support team is available 24/7.
footer_brand_desc: At Azec Unlocks, we are dedicated to helping gamers overcome hardware bans with professional, secure and efficient solutions.
faq_q1_q: Is Azec Unlocks safe to use?
faq_q1_a: Yes. We build every release to avoid detection and we test on live servers before publishing.
faq_q2_q: How fast do I get access after purchase?
faq_q2_a: Instantly. As soon as the payment clears, you'll receive an email with your license key and setup guide.
faq_q3_a: Major credit / debit cards, PayPal, and the most popular cryptocurrencies.
faq_q4_a: Absolutely. Our Discord and live-chat teams are online 24/7, plus an email queue for longer issues.
faq_q5_a: Because keys activate on delivery, refunds aren't possible. Please review the demo videos first.
faq_q6_q: Will this hurt my PC performance?
faq_q6_a: No. The loader is lightweight (under 20 MB RAM) and never pegs the CPU or GPU.
faq_q7_a: We run 24-hour trial weekends every few months—watch our Discord announcements for dates.
faq_q8_q: How often do you update the software?
faq_q8_a: Usually within 24 hours of any major game patch, often sooner.
faq_q9_q: What are the minimum system requirements?
faq_q9_a: Windows 10/11 64-bit, Intel or AMD CPU with SSE4.2, and DirectX 12.
faq_q10_q: Is it legal to use Azec Unlocks?
faq_q10_a: Our software is for educational purposes only. Usage may violate game terms of service.
guides_subtitle: Step-by-step instructions and pro tips to unlock every advantage with Azec Unlocks.
guide0_content: Before installing, temporarily disable your anti-virus and Windows Defender. This prevents false positives and ensures a smooth setup.
guide1_content: 1. Download the loader from your account dashboard. 2. Extract the ZIP file. 3. Run the installer as administrator. 4. Enter your license key when prompted.
guide2_content: If you see errors, restart your PC and try again. For persistent issues, contact support with your error code.
guide3_content: Always use the latest version. Avoid streaming or recording while using the software. Never share your license key.
guide4_content: Check for updates in your dashboard. Download and install updates promptly to stay undetected.
contact_subtitle: Have a question, issue, or just want to say hi? Drop us a message and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
